string.value:
Operation strategy 2 is much simpler than strategy 1. It was to defeat the monsters! You must defeat #r#o4230113##k, #r#o3230306##k, #r#o4230114##k, #r#o4230115##k, and even #r#o5220003##k, so it's not child's play... but let's defeat the monsters.

#o4230113# #r#a32491##k 
#o3230306# #r#a32492##k 
#o4230114# #r#a32493##k 
#o4230115# #r#a32494##k 
#o5220003# #r#a32495##k
You have reported to #p2041026# after defeating all the monsters. It's not as easy as it may seem since there are so many types of monsters to hunt!
Operation strategy 2 is, obviously, defeating the monsters! Now that you've collected the eggs, let's begin defeating the monsters to wipe out the Clocktower Monsters. How about it? Are you ready?
Go hunt the monsters. If you hunt #r20 #o4230113##k, #r30 #o3230306##k, #r40 #o4230114##k, #r50 #o4230115##k, and #r1 #o5220003##k; wouldn't the tower be somewhat home free? Now, hurry and...

What's with the face? There are too many monsters to remember? Fine, I'll tell you again... NOT. Why don't you just view your Information window as you proceed with the quest? Problem solved. Go get 'em now!
Hmm, you're not ready? Are you hungry or something? Would you like a hamburger? No, I'm not offering you want... I'm just asking if you want one.

Have you defeated all the monsters? Wow, incredible! You're truly amazing. It took you a lot less than I expected. Even our members would have taken longer... simply amazing, you! I'm sure the Clocktower Monsters are under control now. Thanks!

You haven't defeated all the monsters yet? Did you forget which monsters to hunt? Sigh... I'll tell you again. Pay attention this time. #r20 #o4230113##k, #r30 #o3230306##k, #r40 #o4230114##k, #r50 #o4230115##k, and #r1 #o5220003##k. Got it?
